name: Silines
description:
Reach the end of a bleak alien landscape, avoiding the aliens determined to destroy you... pick up the green 'L' bonus balls to grow legs, allowing you to fire back...  having just the one leg can be awkward and the more legs you can grow, the faster you'll move and the more bullets you'll fire.  The aliens can drop additional bonuses, for absolutely no reason at all.

Developed over 2 days on the first ever Locomojam 2019; a train journey running from Brisbane to Melbourne over 2 days with no power and very windows of internet access.

Enjoy an endless array of procedurally generated levels, let the bombs take your legs and not your life.
